title: 关于bc跳转
author: 暮里魔理沙
txt_content:
使用serverjoiner插件
版本1.15.2
跳转菜单的gui能正常加载出来
但是点击跳转的时候报错没反应
[20:58:10] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event InventoryClickEvent to ServerJoiner v0.0.1
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory.getTitle()Ljava/lang/String;
        at com.ejiamc.ayou.ServerJoiner.Listeners.onClick(Listeners.java:36) ~[?:?]
        at com.destroystokyo.paper.event.executor.asm.generated.GeneratedEventExecutor44.execute(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.EventExecutor.lambda$create$1(EventExecutor.java:69) ~[Paper-1.15.2-b143.jar:git-Paper-142]

        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:559) ~[Paper-1.15.2-b143.jar:git-Paper-142]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.PlayerConnectionUtils.lambda$ensureMainThread$0(PlayerConnectionUtils.java:23) ~[Paper-1.15.2-b143.jar:git-Paper-142]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.TickTask.run(SourceFile:18) ~[Paper-1.15.2-b143.jar:git-Paper-142]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.IAsyncTaskHandler.executeTask(IAsyncTaskHandler.java:136) ~[Paper-1.15.2-b143.jar:git-Paper-142]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.IAsyncTaskHandlerReentrant.executeTask(SourceFile:23) ~[Paper-1.15.2-b143.jar:git-Paper-142]

[20:58:38] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 19/INFO]: [PlaceholderAPI] 171 placeholder expansions are available on the cloud.
复制代码请问怎么解决？或者有无其他方法可以在菜单里显示子服人数与状态，并且点击跳转的？

replies.author: 孤独2333
replies.txt_content: 只要安装一个bc端就好了呀，如果没有bc端可以去mcbbs内服务器端整合区下载一个，然后再套端就行了

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory.getTitle()Ljava/lang/String;

看起来是你的插件不支持你的bukkit版本
